name: Limpet Launcher
effect: When you hit an enemy with this weapon, add a stack to them. When you reload any of these weapons all stacks explode dealing 1d3 Explosive damage per stack in a Burst 1 Area centred on the enemy who was afflicted with the stacks. If there is more than 1 enemy afflicted with stacks from these weapons, they take damage equal to their stacks, and if they're within Burst 1 of eachother they'll take damage equivalent to their combined stacks (if far enough away to not effect eachother you just take your stacks, if you're in burst 1 your stack damage combines where your burst 1 areas overlap)
description: When we found it in a Baron armory, there was a note attached to it. It said KIRA QUEEN. BITES ZA DUSTO.

effect.detail: May be deployed as a stationary drone within Range 5 and LoS as a quick action. Once deployed, it loses the Seeking tag and you may fire it 2/round as a free action with line of sight and RANGE traced from its location. You may recall or redeploy the Rapid Fire Turret Drone as a quick action. Until recalled or destroyed, it remains deployed until the end of the scene. If destroyed, it follows the rules for destroyed DRONES and can’t be used until repaired.

name: Laser Mortar
effect: This weapon can make two attacks when fired. The attack areas cannot overlap.
description: Traditional mortar propulsion of discs of reflective mirrors followed by a directed energy blast allow a wide area dispersal of fire from angles traditional armor configurations neglect or cannot cover efficiently. Reports of captured ordnance used for dance parties by Ungrateful cells are not verified and should not be disseminated over the omninet.

name: Silk Web Defense Screen

effect.name: Momentum Riposte
effect.trigger: An enemy within Range 5 targets you with an attack.
effect.detail:
You may take 1d6 AP Energy damage to interrupt it and Skirmish with the Silk Web Defense Screen, regardless if the enemy is in range of the weapon.
On hit, the target character’s attack will be reflected back at it for half damage, Heat, and Burn, and you, not the enemy, can be pushed directly away by the combined value of the enemy attack’s knockback and your own knockback.

description: Derived from hardlight, a combination of a plassteel outer frame and electrically charged webbed nanites allow projection of an ionic field to magnetically redirect attacks away from the pilot and lend additional momentum to defensive strikes. The high risk of these maneuvers results in a statistically significant increase in variance of maintenance time for frames using this system.

name: Starpoint Spear
effect:
This weapon begins with 4 charges (Use a die to track this). After firing this weapon, decrease the number of charges by 1. When the number of charges is odd, this weapon deals +1d6 bonus damage, costs 1 Heat to fire, and gains +2 Threat. When the number of charges reaches 1, gain the Loading tag. You can still fire this weapon as long as it has charges. When it hits 0 charges you must reload. Reloading this weapon resets the number of charges to 4 and removes the Loading tag.

Charges persist between scenes.
description: Concentrated plasma magnetically accelerated to a pointed tip allows for a breaching tool design that can capitalize on the momentum from prior applications. Care must be used to ensure uptime, as the weapon contains a limited amount of fuel before it must be reloaded.

name: Burst Sniper
effect: This weapon rolls 3 separate attacks on the single target its fired at. Each of these attacks does 2 damage
description: Thrice the pewpew, for those evasive targets.

name: Codename: BLASTER
effect: The Cone 5 comes out the back of the target hit, directly behind the target.
description: But what if we took a daisy cutter and stuck it on a rifle?

name: Coin Grenade
effect: Dictate a Cone 5 Area that starts adjacent to you. Targets inside this area must make a Hull Save, they take 4 Explosive damage on a failure and half as much on a success. Targets within Range 3 of any of the initial explosions take an additional 2 Explosive damage for each explosion they were within Range 3 of. Targets within range 1 of an explosion take an additional 3 Explosive damage per source instead of the 2 Explosive it would do.

name: Stinger Launcher
description: Can't beat the classics.

name: Slaughter Shotgun
effect: Gains +2 accuracy on first target in line; as a Quick Action you can load a special round causing an additional 2 Explosive damage to each target in the line damage and creating a Cone 3 directly behind the last target in the line that deals 2 Explosive damage to everyone caught in it.

effect.detail: This weapon mount can be chosen to be destroyed on a “Weapon Destroyed” structure roll. When destroyed or when out of charges, changes to the Rifle Butt Profile.

effect.name: Rifle Butt
effect.detail: Attacking with this weapon counts as an Improvised Attack. This weapon gains +2 bonus damage for every destroyed Mount or completely expended Limited System, up to +6, including the Binary Laser Rifle.

name: Golden Wave Laser
effect: This weapon is not affected by Engagement penalties.
description: Wrist-mounted in pairs, Golden Wave pattern laser weaponry allows frame manipulators to remain free for handling delicate engineering work.

name: Sponson Turrets
effect: This weapon cannot directly target characters and objects within Range 3.
description: Turns out a mountain of a mech makes mounting anti-air guns on the head have a terrible traversal angle.

name: Tungsten Boot
effect: On Crit: Targets in Engagement with you must pass a Hull Save or be knocked Prone.
description: Sometimes kinetic energy applied to chassis is best delivered as a dance.

name: Cargo Crane

effect.detail: This weapon can attack twice. Enemies destroyed by this weapon explode in a Burst 1 area, damaging all targets within for 2 KINETIC damage.

effect.critical: The target must make a HULL save or be Slowed.

description: If it can haul multiple tons of cargo, it can haul multiple tons of mechanized cavalry torso.

name: Tandem Cannon
effect: You may pick two separate targets when firing this weapon. This weapon cannot attack targets within range 3.
description: This Weapon Is a Placeholder. Carry On Citizen.

effect.name: Alt Fire
effect.detail: This weapon fires 3 shots at once. These shots may go to separate targets or the same target in any distribution the user sees fit.

name: Plasma Cannon
effect: This weapon can be charged with a Quick Action and to increase its area of effect to Blast 2.
description: Conventional shoulder-mounted anti-armor launchers reworked into man-portable party cannons

name: Laser Chainsaw
effect: This weapon attacks additional targets in a Line 3 area originating from your target; if you are at a higher elevation than your first target when you attack, this weapon can attack as a Cone 3.
description: Coldcore reactor bleed funneled through plasma capillaries and cycled away from the frame creates directed bursts of energy. These “blades” are weaponized by daredevil pilots in close combat; by directing the intense energy into another solid target and not radiating the waste heat in the air, these pilots actually impede heat diffusion in their own frame.

name: Thunder Stinger
effect: When you attack with this weapon, make a Cone 3 attack and a Cone 5 attack originating from the space of your attack, in the same direction as your attack. Make attack rolls for each target caught in each area; this can hit the same target multiple times. The Cone 3 and Cone 5 secondary attacks do 1d6 Energy each hit.
description: The Thunder Stinger is a crossbow-shaped weapon using an enormous magnet to shape electrical discharges from ionized rails. The rapid diffusion of energy into the air limits operational effectiveness, and only the most reckless SHOTEL pilots utilize this weapon, as the Baronies never procured it for mass production.
